page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: These are the small farmsteads in our grid area in July,1985: REF.7143: 1. TRYFAL Owner: JOHN DAVIES 323 acres STOCK:Welsh black cows and 1300 sheep. Family has farmed here for 400 years. Mr. Davies, now 77 years old, has farmed here since 1942. No special problems, such as sheep pneumonia, in l985. Helpers are eldest son, Owen Davies, with another brother and sister helping part-time. 2. MINAFON ROBERT EMRYS JONES Not used s farm. One field rented to Aneurin Parry,Teiliau Mawr. 3. TEILIAU MAWR ANEURIN PARRY 36 hectares which includes mountain. STOCK: 400 sheep. Mainly grazing land.Owner for 20 years. 2 helpers to dip and gather sheep from mountain pasture.
